text: Kirriemuir is a small town in the northeast of Scotland. It is "famous" for Kirriemuir Gingerbread cake, the birthplace of J. M. Barrie and Bon Scott, lead singer of AC/DC. It has an ice cream shop called Visochi's, famous for cooking its fry ups using a toastie maker. Category:Towns in Scotland Category:Angus
title: Kirriemuir
